title: Cisco Secure Firewall - Security Events
description: - This dashboard provides insights into security events logs.

definition.content:
## Overview
- This dashboard provides insights into security events logs.

## Widgets

1. Security Events Over Time 
2. Security Events by Severity 
3. Security Events by Types 
4. Total Intrusions 
5. Total Connections 
6. Total Malware Detected File Count 
7. Total Intrude Source IPs 
8. Total Intrude Destination IPs 
9. Distribution of Intrude Source 
10. Top Protocols Associated with Intrusion 
11. Intrusion by Classification 
12. Top Intruded Policies 
13. Security Events by Clients Apps 
14. Top Application Protocols 
15. Events by ACPolicy 
16. Events by NAPPolicy 
17. Event Distribution by Access Control Rule Action 
18. Top Connecting Source IP 
19. Top Connecting Destination IP

definition.title: Event Distribution by Access Control Rule Action
